name: CreateExplosionForPlayer
notes: There is a limit as to how many explosions can be seen at once by a player. This is roughly 10.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3z R2-2 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Creates an explosion that is only visible to a single player. This can be used to isolate explosions from other players or to make them only appear in specific virtual worlds.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to create the explosion for.

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The X coordinate of the explosion.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The Y coordinate of the explosion.

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The Z coordinate of the explosion.

return_values: This function always returns 1, even if the function failed to excute (player doesn't exist, invalid radius, or invalid explosion type).
related_fn: CreateExplosion: Create an explosion which is visible for all players.
